title: textPath
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The SVG <textPath> element defines a set of content for display along a <path> element which corresponds to a shape defined in the SVG's graphical layout.

usageExamples.title: Basic Example
usageExamples.description: This example shows the basic usage of the textPath tag.
usageExamples.code:
<svg>
  <path d="M10 10 H 90 V 90 H 10 L 10 10" />
  <text>
    <textPath href="#MyPath">We go up, then we go down, then up again</textPath>
  </text>
</svg>
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/svg
	/path @d="M10 10 H 90 V 90 H 10 L 10 10"
	/text
		/textPath @href="#MyPath"
			We go up, then we go down, then up again
